scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && shx mkdir -p dist/content dist/background dist/popup && esbuild src/content/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/content/index.js --target=chrome112 && esbuild src/background/service-worker.ts --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/background/service-worker.js --target=chrome112 && esbuild src/popup/popup.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/popup/popup.js --target=chrome112 && shx cp src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && shx cp src/popup/popup.css dist/popup/ && shx cp manifest.json dist/ && shx cp -r assets dist/
